meanings.sent1: She is nonallergic to cats, so she can play with them without any problems.
meanings.sent2: The nonallergic reaction to the pollen allowed him to enjoy the spring weather without sneezing.
meanings.sent3: Even though he claimed to be nonallergic to homework, his grades showed otherwise.
meanings.sent4: Her nonallergic attitude towards criticism helped her grow and improve.
meanings.sent5: The nonallergic nature of the fabric made it perfect for sensitive skin.

meanings.sent1: The nonallergic detergent was gentle on her skin and didn't cause any irritation.
meanings.sent2: The nonallergic food was a relief for those with food sensitivities.
meanings.sent3: The nonallergic paint was a hit among artists who often had allergic reactions to other brands.
meanings.sent4: His nonallergic behavior towards criticism created a positive work environment.
meanings.sent5: The nonallergic plants in the garden attracted butterflies without triggering any allergies.
